title: Marketplace Money for Friday, May 30, 2014
byline: Candace Manriquez, Barbara Bogaev and Kaitlin Funaro
teaser: This weekend on Marketplace Money, guest host Barbara Bogaev talks with psychologist Emily Bianchi about the link between narcissism and growing up during a recession. Also, Marketplace Tech Report host Ben Johnson joins Barbara Bogaev to talk what's new in the world of technology. Financial expert Lauren Lyons Cole stops by to help answer listeners' most challenging financial questions. Catey Hill, consumer reporter for MarketWatch, joins the show to give some tips on when to find the best shopping deals. Barbara Bogaev is also joined by Gerri Detweiler, the director of consumer education for Credit.com, about how and when to consider taking out a debt consolidation loan.
